== Foundations ==
 

=== Goobuntu Roundtable ===

* Ubuntu apapted for Google internal use (desktop, laptop)
* 96 packages changes from Dapper, 38 packages changed for Hardy
* Based off of LTS releases
* nnscache open source from Google to solve some LDAP porblems
* Plan to participate in hardy-backport project, instead of internal backport
* Google Sysop is very happy on how Hardy turned out
* Plans to participate in next LTS -1 to get reader for next LTS.
* NVidia drivers cause problem for updating.
* Google does internal QA testing for sending out updates.
* deb files was one of the reason of switching from RedHat 9
